wikipedia_page.main: David John Richardson (born August 1964) is a British academic who is currently Vice-Chancellor of the University of East Anglia.

response: *David J. Richardson, optical engineer, gave his name to the David Richardson Medal

Since 2005, David J. Richardson (University of East Anglia) has been honorary editor. Colin Bingle is the editor-in-chief in 2020.  According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2020 impact factor of 6.5.
